name: mm101-tutorial-matchfunction
description: an open match matchfunction service in node.js

scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build -t openmatch/matchfunction .
scripts.kube:build: docker build -t remarkable/mm101-tutorial-matchfunction . && minikube image load remarkable/mm101-tutorial-matchfunction
scripts.kube:apply: kubectl delete -f matchfunction.yaml && kubectl apply -f matchfunction.yaml
